page.title: Pokédex - Gotta Catch 'Em All!
page.description: Explore the world of Pokémon with our comprehensive Pokédex

search.placeholder: Search Pokémon by name or number...
search.load_more_hint: Scroll down to load more Pokémon

footer.copyright: © 2025 Pokédex App. Made with ❤️ for Pokémon trainers everywhere.

quote.oak: There's a time and place for everything, but not now!
quote.elm: The important thing is not how long you live. It's what you accomplish with your life.
quote.birch: Pokemon are living creatures that inhabit every corner of our world.
quote.rowan: The bond between Pokemon and trainer... That's what makes them strong.
quote.juniper: Dreams are the compass that guides us to our destination.
quote.sycamore: The key to Pokemon training is understanding your Pokemon's feelings.
quote.kukui: Pokemon battles are about the bond between trainer and Pokemon!
quote.magnolia: Even the mightiest Pokemon were once small and weak.
quote.laventon: The more we learn about Pokemon, the more wondrous they become.
quote.nemona: Every Pokemon has its own unique charm and personality.

404.title: Page Not Found
404.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist.
404.message: The Pokémon you're looking for seems to have wandered off into the tall grass!
404.help: Let's get you back on the right path.
